extendedInfo.description: "Fluid Football is like the perfect blend of New Star Soccer, Score Great Goals and Flick Kick" - T3"Fluid Footballâs mechanics are unlike anything Iâve seen before...this game might be a wish come true for you." - Pocket Tactics"Fluid Football is bl***y brilliant" - Simon Read, creator of New Star SoccerFrom the team behind console smash hits LMA Manager and Club Football comes FLUID FOOTBALL, an addictive strategy game that puts real-time tactical decision making at your fingertips. Fluid Football places you at the heart of the action, letting you call the shots and test your strategic know-how in a series of high pressure on-field situations where only you can decide the best way to beat the defence and carry your team to victory.Developed in close collaboration with award-winning expert commentators Andy Gray and Richard Keys, Fluid Football merges complex tactical scenarios with a beautifully simple control system that allows you to easily direct your whole team's actions by drawing runs and passes. Use real world techniques to score in a series of challenging set piece scenarios. Can you turn chances into goals and ultimately lift the cup? Andy Gray and Richard Keys are on hand to appraise your performance, and you can always Ask Andy for in depth advice, or practice your skills in The Academy.Each level of Fluid Football has been intricately designed by real-world experts to recreate the pivotal moment of a match - throw-ins, corners and free kicks that set the stage for sensational goals. You have complete tactical freedom to win the match- string together passes, out-pace defenders, set up pinpoint crosses - if you can do it on the field you can do it in Fluid Football.Fluid Football is THE football game this season that puts tactical decision making at your fingertips.**** Features ****- Play through challenging cups with dozens of objectives to complete.- Designed by real-world tactical experts for full authenticity- Highly intuitive drawing-based controls enable you to control complex scenarios- 3D view for precision goal shooting- Full hint system to help you beat the trickier challenges- Commentary by the Sony Award-winning team of Andy Gray and Richard Keys- Unlock dozens of challenges with more being added in future updatesCopyright 2013 Fluid Games Ltd and Gray Cooper Media Ltd.Published by AppyNation and Gray Cooper MediaLIKE US: http://www.facebook.com/FluidFootballFOLLOW US: http://www.twitter.com/FluidFootballVISIT US: http://www.appynation.com/WATCH US: http://www.youtube.com/appynation

reviews.title: Good but few free levels
reviews.comment: I really liked this game, it is something different to the usual football games but I was surprised at how few free levels there are. It\'d get 5 stars if there were at least a few more free levels!
reviews.author: Harry Stephenson

reviews.title: Pretty cool.
reviews.comment: You can\'t play an actual soccer game but it\'s not bad.
reviews.author: Arsenio Bringas

reviews.title: Best alternative to Score
reviews.comment: Actually a pretty good game. Different to other football games and better than most. So far the best alternative to Score but does need more levels
reviews.author: Zuheeb Sheikh

reviews.title: Good but.....
reviews.comment: It\'s a really good game. You control the players and try scoring goals. Kind of reminds me of the iPhone game called classic goals something along those lines. But you only have 3 stages to play and each stage has 6 missions. After completing those stages you have to pay for the next ones that\'s why I give this game a 4 star rating
reviews.author: Subhan Khalifa

reviews.title: Cool fun and awesome
reviews.comment: Yeah I am so loving the game
reviews.author: Anna Kelly

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Runs buttery smooth and has fun addictive gameplay as well as half decent graphics and the option to design your own kit! :D Downside, not enough free levels...
reviews.author: Sam Shipp

reviews.title: Very fun game one of the best I\'ve  seen so far.
reviews.comment: The quality is perfect and very good technique a of football.
reviews.author: mohamedhussain zaveri

reviews.title: Shame
reviews.comment: Shame that logging into Facebook doesn\'t work right on nexus 7, after logging in I cannot set permissions and the only option selectable is to log in as another user. Window is too small and cannot be scrolled.
reviews.author: Phil Penman

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: The game.... Is awesome, cool, fantastic, one should must buy it. But.... Please improve some graphics
reviews.author: parth gadre

reviews.title: Coins are useless
reviews.comment: Despite earning coins, they\'re basically useless since you can replay the matches as often as you want. What they need to do is make it so that you can open new content with coins instead of having to pay money.
reviews.author: Michael Powell

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I\'ve been on the lookout for a game like this, since seeing score on iOs. This game is a perfect mix of top down football and flick kick style scoring. The addition of Andy gray commentary is a touch of genius too. well done.
reviews.author: George Beck

reviews.title: dissappointed
reviews.comment: oh i expect so much from this game, but when i open it its showing blank screen after showing loading... but i can hear sound of some match was going on... please guys fix thos problem... my model is samsung galaxy y.
reviews.author: Sumithra Starson

reviews.comment: JUST LIKE SCORE FROM IPHONE 4 As I say u have to pass in goal !,,,,!     The Reason I Rated 5 STAR Was Because I Have Played SCORE From My Big Brother
reviews.author: tyson kidd

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: On iPhone I found a great call score and I have been looking for something similar on android and I can say that this is possibly the best alternative to the original score game on apple itunes. Great fun would recommend to all
reviews.author: Tejpal Singh

reviews.comment: This game is absolute dog bollocks, it doesn\'t shoot the ball
reviews.author: Sagar Rai

reviews.title: A good game but
reviews.comment: It\'s a really good game but few levels are free then you have to buy them, shows too many ads and is very very easy. Should be more challenging
reviews.author: Ahad KhaN

reviews.title: CAN\'T SHOOT FOR NOTHING!!!
reviews.comment: Its a good game but EVERY TIME A SHOOT A EITHER HIT CROSSBAR OR IT GOES OVER THE GOAL. NO MATTER WHAT DISTANCE!!!!! Fix this and then I will give u 5 stars
reviews.author: Jeremy Brown

reviews.title: Challengs
reviews.comment: I find this game very fun to pass my time and it gives me an opportunity to improve football tactics. Although if it was more 3d instead of the birds eye view itd be more fun!
reviews.author: Yash Kanabar

reviews.title: Absolutely crape
reviews.comment: The build up play is ok hut it won\'t let me shoot!! No matter how many times I try so poor sensitivity- Sony experia e
reviews.author: Todd Carruthers
